Five

Visit website: www.five.agency

About Five

Five is a software development company creating five star mobile applications for leading mobile platforms. Five has an impressive in-house team of creatives, designers and developers who tailor their expertise to deliver state of the art mobile apps for clients and partners.

Company Profile
Five is a young and vibrant privately owned company with 55 full-time employees. Over the past seven years through offices in USA and Croatia we have supported 50+ clients worldwide in development of their mobile strategy and digital presence.

Platforms and Technology
Company develops high quality digital products and offers turnkey solutions for mobile and web. Five fully supports native mobile development (iOS, Android, Windows Phone) as well as advanced HTML5 solutions. We offer accompanying front-end and back-end web development in Java and Ruby on Rails.

References
The majority of our clients come from the markets of USA and Europe. We have partnered with Real Networks, Rhapsody, Squarespace, Verve Mobile, Livewire Mobile, Apsmart, MeetMoi, and Netthandelen, while on regional market the company works with large enterprises like Siemens, T-Mobile, Mobilkom Austria, and Allianz.

Five has successfully executed software development projects across various industry segments such as telecommunication, retail, media and publishing industry, accounting and insurance.
